mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET NICKNAME = #{nickname}, PROFILE_IMG = #{profileImg}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EXPERT_LOCATION (USER_ID, LOCATION_ID) SELECT #{userId}, LOCATION_ID FROM LOCATION WHERE DISTRICT = #{location}
INSERT INTO EXPERT_CATEGORY (USER_ID, CATEGORY_ID) SELECT #{userId}, CATEGORY_ID FROM CATEGORY WHERE NAME = #{category}
INSERT INTO EXPERT_LICENSE (LICENSE_ID, NAME, PATH, USER_ID) VALUES (EXPERT_LICENSE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{path}, #{userId})
